titlestmt.titleproper: Engineering, Science, and Management Defense Training (E.S.M.D.T.) and Engineering, Science, and Management War Training (E. S. M. W. T. ) Student and Course RecordsUA215

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.unittitle: Engineering, Science, and Management Defense Training (E.S.M.D.T.) and Engineering, Science, and Management War Training (E. S. M. W. T. ) Student and Course Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Engineering, Science, and Management Defense Training (ESMDT) / Engineering, Science, Management War Training (ESMWT)

did.abstract: The collection contains index cards concerning Engineering, Science, and Management Defense Training and Engineering, Science, and Management War Training Student and Course records.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series: Index cards.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: These three card indices was found in the basement vault of Ballou Hall in summer of 2010 and transferred to DCA in fall of 2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains index cards concerning Engineering, Science, and Management Defense Training and Engineering, Science, and Management War Training Student and Course records. It includes three card indices: the alphabetical card index includes ESMDT/ESMWT students from 1941 through 1943. At the end of the student index, there is a numerical card index of all courses taught from January 1941-1943 under ESMDT/ESMWT. After the numerical course index, there are a few cards of ESMWT prospective student for spring 1944.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

did.unittitle: Engineering, Science, and Management Defense / War Training Student Index Cards

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains the alphabetical card index of ESMDT/ESMWT students from 1941 through 1943. Cards usually list the student's name, address, course number (top right hand corner), date of course, employer, whether s/he received a certificate. In the third box, at the end of the student index, there is a numerical course card index listing all courses taught from January 1941-1943 under ESMDT/ESMWT. Each card lists the title of the course, course number, dates, time of class, hours per week/weeks of course, enrollment, certificates, professors and lecturers in charge (usually listed on the back page). Following the numerical course index in the third box, there are a few cards of prospective ESMWT students for spring 1944.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged first by a student index, then a course index, and then a prospective 1944 ESMWT student index.
The student index and the prospective ESMWT student card index are arranged alphabetically, the course index is arranged by course number starting with course number 401.

did.unittitle: E.S.M.D.T. Student card index Q-Z; Course index, and prospective ESMWT student index for spring 1944

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: While the original card boxes were labeled ESMDT, the cards actually also include the ESMWT program initiated when the U. S. entered World War II.
